t2.Experienced Fighter: Attacked targets take 16% more DMG. Does not stack with the same effect from other allies.
t2.Excellent Strategy: Increases CC Accuracy of all allies by 100. If another ally has the same Perk, only 50 additional CC Accuracy is applied.
t2.Battle Cry: Increases Max HP of all allies by 10%. If another ally has the same Perk, only 5% additional Max HP is applied.
t2.Shield of Protection: Increases All Block by 150 and CC Resistance by 150.
t2.Swift Move: Increases ATK Speed by 12% and ACC by 120.
